Orochimaru first punches the opponent in the face and knocks them back. He then wraps the opponent with [[Hidden Shadow Snake Hands|countless snakes]] which creates a dome around them and holds them. He then jumps and stabs them with his [[Sword of Kusanagi (Orochimaru)|Sword of Kusanagi]], finishing them off.
